mapper.select: select id, category, title, owner_id, owner, content, view_counts, date_format(create_date, '%Y-%m-%d %T') create_date from bbs where is_delete = 0 and id = #{id}
mapper.insert: insert into bbs(category, title, owner_id, owner, content) values(#{category}, #{title}, #{ownerId}, #{owner}, #{content})
mapper.update: update bbs set category = #{category}, title=#{title}, content=#{content} where id = #{id} and owner_id = #{ownerId}
update bbs set is_delete = 1 where id = #{id} and owner_id = #{ownerId}
update bbs set view_counts = view_counts + 1 where id = #{id}
